author: gsim
msg: QPID-2817: on close, wait for at most the heartbeat interval (if specified) for close-ok response from broker

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-1634 Further improvements for login support: on the left hand side the login status is now listed with the user name and an option to log out (if logged in). If not logged in options are displayed to login or to signup. Added a simple, non-functional signup page.

msg: SLING-1370 First implementation of an authentication selector pseudo authentication handler
